column1: duane h. walker| duane h. walker
column6: 2015 at his home. he was born on may 7
column10: the son of the late benjamin and nellie (crowe) walker. he earned his masters degree in english from the university of wisconsin madison. duane had taught english at milton high school and uw platteville. he later was employed as a programming machinist for apv crepaco. he was also preceded in death by his brother
column11: donald walker. a memorial visitation will be held from 10 a. m. to 12 noon on friday
column13: 2015 at the claussen funeral home in lake mills. if desired
column14: memorials may be made to the lake mills food pantry. www. claussenfuneralhome. com
